name: Hallway Slayer
description:
My second attempt at making a game in Unity !

Its a game where you can generate a level and just wipe the hallways full of enemies.

There are many weapons that, not only you can shoot with, but also throw at them.

Because the fps is locked to 60 in WebGL, it affects the physics and sometimes hit detection can be hit or miss.

  • W,A,S,D - Movement
  • LMB - Shooting
  • RMB - Throwing weapons
  • ESC - Pause

Game made by VenixSK

Music made by Karl Casey / White Bat Audio
